mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r.review_score), 1), 0) as avg_score, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.review_num), 0) as review_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrollment_id), 0) as student_count FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN review r ON l.lecture_num = r.lecture_num LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON l.lecture_num = e.lecture_num GROUP BY l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag ORDER BY l.readcount DESC

SELECT l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r.review_score), 1), 0) as avg_score, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.review_num), 0) as review_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrollment_id), 0) as student_count FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN review r ON l.lecture_num = r.lecture_num LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON l.lecture_num = e.lecture_num GROUP BY l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag ORDER BY l.readcount DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r.review_score), 1), 0) as avg_score, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.review_num), 0) as review_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrollment_id), 0) as student_count FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN review r ON l.lecture_num = r.lecture_num LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON l.lecture_num = e.lecture_num WHERE category_detail = #{category_detail} GROUP BY l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag ORDER BY l.readcount DESC

SELECT l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r.review_score), 1), 0) as avg_score, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.review_num), 0) as review_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrollment_id), 0) as student_count FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN review r ON l.lecture_num = r.lecture_num LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON l.lecture_num = e.lecture_num WHERE category_detail = #{category_detail} GROUP BY l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag ORDER BY l.readcount DESC LIMIT 10
select u.user_file, u.user_num from lecture l join user u on l.user_num = u.user_num where l.lecture_num = #{lecture_num}

SELECT l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(r.review_score), 1), 0) as avg_score, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT r.review_num), 0) as review_count, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT e.enrollment_id), 0) as student_count FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN review r ON l.lecture_num = r.lecture_num LEFT JOIN enrollment e ON l.lecture_num = e.lecture_num WHERE l.lecture_author = #{lecture_author} AND l.lecture_num != #{lecture_num} GROUP BY l.lecture_num, l.user_num, l.lecture_title, l.lecture_author, l.lecture_price, l.category_detail, l.readcount, l.lecture_img, l.lecture_detail, l.lecture_tag ORDER BY l.readcount DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT r.review_num, r.lecture_num, r.user_id, r.review_score, r.review_content, u.user_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE user_id = r.user_id) as review_count, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(review_score), 1) FROM review WHERE user_id = r.user_id) as avg_score FROM review r INNER JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.lecture_num = #{lecture_num} ORDER BY r.review_score DESC
SELECT lecture_num, user_num, lecture_title, lecture_author, lecture_price, category_detail, readcount, lecture_img, lecture_detail, lecture_tag FROM lecture WHERE lecture_num = #{lecture_num}
mapper.insert: insert into review(user_id, lecture_num, review_score, review_content) values(#{user_id},#{lecture_num},#{review_score},#{review_content})
